example.text: One of the remaining three families carried a 3-bp in-frame deletion that would eliminate an asparagine residue within a kinase domain of the product; the other two carried intronic mutations at or adjacent to the consensus dinucleotide sequences of splice-acceptor or-donor sites, which were likely to lead to aberrant splicing.
example.arg: [within] a kinase domain of the product
